p: As illustrated in Fig. 3 and Additional file 2: Table S1 , all twelve districts of Guangzhou were affected by the outbreak. The highest incidence occurred in Baiyun with 530.47 per 100,000 (11,834 cases), followed by Liwan 488.68 per 100,000 (4466), Yuexiu 406.71 per 100,000 (4790), Haizhu 379.66 per 100,000 (5995), Huangpu 315.19 per 100,000 (1449), Panyu 248.73 per 100,000 (3540), Tianhe 238.78 per 100,000 (3431), Luogang 96.02 per 100,000 (359), Nansha 79.46 per 100,000 (483), Huadu 57.11 per 100,000 (542), Zengcheng 32.45 per 100,000 (348) and the lowest in Conghua 16.76 per 100,000 (103), respectively.
